sentences.english: Police in flak jackets are patrolling the districts hit by the violence.
sentences.chinese: 身穿防彈衣的警察正在遭受暴力攻擊的地段巡邏。

sentences.english: At this time, party boat is a sweet promise only to find the police.
sentences.chinese: 這時，方小舟才發現許嫣然是個警察。

sentences.english: Office of build Sancha reservations, withdrawal state Department contractor, based Police at the Office.
sentences.chinese: 三岔廳建置保留，撤州判署，設警察分廳。

sentences.english: The police are also urging him to have his daughter's body cremated quickly, he said.
sentences.chinese: 警察還極力敦促他儘快將女兒的遺體火化，陳廣乾說。

sentences.english: A young policeman has been accused of conspiring with a gang of criminals.
sentences.chinese: 一名年輕警察被指控與一個犯罪集團相勾結。

sentences.english: The bad police officer in that movie thought he was above the law.
sentences.chinese: 那部電影中的壞警察自認不受法律的約束。

sentences.english: The police hustled the tramps out of town .
sentences.chinese: 警察驅逐遊民離開城市。

sentences.english: The policeman stopped the thief from stealing money in the shop.
sentences.chinese: 警察阻止小偷從商店裏偷錢。

sentences.english: I killed someone, so I had to go. Otherwise I would be captured and sentenced to death.
sentences.chinese: 殺了人，我害怕被警察抓住判刑槍斃。

sentences.english: Darren is battering a guy on the corner and the cops are on their way.
sentences.chinese: 達倫在街角打人，警察已經在路上了。

sentences.english: C. Sorry , I don"t know Pleaseask the policeman over there."
sentences.chinese: 對不起，我不知道，請問那邊的警察。

sentences.english: I had to go below ground to an office where I spoke to a policeman.
sentences.chinese: 我走到了地下的一間辦公室才和一個警察說上話。

sentences.english: Had the policemen arrived immediately, the criminal would have been caught.
sentences.chinese: 若是警察立刻到，就會抓獲罪犯。

sentences.english: The takings clause mediates between the police power and the eminent domain power.
sentences.chinese: 徵收條款是在警察權有償取得財產權的調和。

sentences.english: Tiffany told me and the police that he had a heart stroke while they were in bed.
sentences.chinese: 蒂芙妮對警察對我說是他是在牀上犯了心臟病猝死。

sentences.english: Some officers lashed out with batons and shields, but their superiors restrained them.
sentences.chinese: 一些警察揮動着警棍和盾牌，但被他們的上級阻止了。
